_comment: Example settings for Ansible Rulebook Editor
_note: These settings are stored in browser localStorage with key 'rulebook-editor-settings'
_instructions: Copy and modify this, then paste into browser console: localStorage.setItem('rulebook-editor-settings', JSON.stringify({...}))

_field_descriptions.ansibleRulebookPath: Full path to ansible-rulebook executable (find with: which ansible-rulebook)
_field_descriptions.workingDirectory: Working directory for ansible-rulebook execution (blank = current directory)
_field_descriptions.ngrokApiToken: Ngrok API token for cloud tunnels (get from https://dashboard.ngrok.com/api)
_field_descriptions.autoShowJsonExplorer: Automatically show JSON Path Explorer when webhooks are received (true/false)
